translation.en: [Optimus] We were once a peaceful race of intelligent, mechanical beings.
translation.ja: かつて我々は平和的な知性ある金属生命体だった

translation.en: But then came the war
translation.ja: しかし戦争が起こった

translation.en: between the Autobots, who fought for freedom,
translation.ja: 自由のために戦うオートボットと⸺

translation.en: and the Decepticons, who dreamt of tyranny.
translation.ja: 独裁をもくろむディセプティコンの戦いだ

translation.en: Overmatched and outnumbered, our defeat was all but certain.
translation.ja: 我々オートボットは劣勢で敗北が迫っていた

translation.en: But in the war's final days,
translation.ja: だが戦争の最終局面に⸺

translation.en: one Autobot ship escaped the battle.
translation.ja: オートボットの船が戦場を脱出した

translation.en: It was carrying a secret cargo, which would have changed our planet's fate.
translation.ja: 我が星の運命を変える秘密の物体を載せて

translation.en: A desperate mission.
Our final hope.
A hope that vanished.
[man 1] One up there. One over there.
And one more down there.
What you got?
[man 2] Impact detected.
We have impact confirmed.
translation.ja: 衝撃を確認しました時刻は⸺

translation.en: Contact at 2250 GMT.
translation.ja: 衝撃を確認しました時刻は⸺ ＮＡＳＡ長官－バージニア州ラングレー ＮＡＳＡ長官－バージニア州ラングレー 22時50分

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: ＮＡＳＡ長官－バージニア州ラングレー

translation.en: Get me SecDef on the phone right away.
[man] Mr. McNamara, the President is expecting you.
translation.ja: 大統領が お待ちです

translation.en: [Kennedy] Get Bobby in here.
[McNamara] Mr. President, designation, top secret.
translation.ja: 大統領 極秘情報ですＵＦＯが月面に墜落

translation.en: We believe a UFO has crashed into the moon.
translation.ja: 極秘情報ですＵＦＯが月面に墜落

translation.en: We think the Russians are onto it as well.
Well, then you tell NASA to move heaven and earth. We need to get to the moon.
translation.ja: ＮＡＳＡに緊急通告しろ月に行かねば

translation.en: [McNamara] We're going to attempt a manned mission. NASA said it would take five years.
translation.ja: 有人飛行までには５年かかるとか

translation.en: You get there before the Russians.
[Kennedy] I believe that this nation should commit itself to achieving the goal,
translation.ja: 国全体が力を合わせれば目標を達成できる

translation.en: before this decade is out,
of landing a man on the moon and returning him safely to the Earth.
translation.ja: 月に人を送り無事に帰還させるのだ

translation.en: [NASA technician] Ignition sequence start.
Five, four, three... ...two, one.
Liftoff. We have a liftoff.
translation.ja: エンジン点火 ロケット上昇開始

translation.en: Thirty-two minutes past the hour. Liftoff on Apollo 11.
translation.ja: ロケット上昇開始 アポロ11号の打ち上げに成功しました

translation.en: Neil Armstrong reporting Apollo 11 on proper heading.
translation.ja: こちらはニール･アームストロング

translation.en: Apollo 11 is on the way,
riding that pillar of flame
translation.ja: サターン５ロケットの噴射により⸺

translation.en: from the Saturn V out there, 250,000 miles away,
translation.ja: サターン５ロケットの噴射により⸺ 40万キロの彼方を目指します

translation.en: where the moon is waiting for man's first arrival.
translation.ja: 月が人類の初到着を待っています

translation.en: Houston, you're a go for landing. Over.
[Buzz] Forty feet, down two-and-a-half. Picking up some dust.
translation.ja: 下降を開始する砂塵が舞ってる

translation.en: Thirty feet, two-and-a-half down. Faint shadow.
translation.ja: 月面まで９メートル影が見える

translation.en: Capcom, Flight.
Four forward. Drifting to the right a little.
translation.ja: 1.2メートル前へ右に流れてる

translation.en: Contact light.
Okay, engine stop.
[Neil] Houston,
Tranquility Base here.
The Eagle has landed.
[technician] We copy you down, Eagle.
You got a bunch of guys about to turn blue. We're breathing again.
translation.ja: 全員がやっと息をつけたよ

translation.en: [Cronkite] Perhaps 400 million persons
translation.ja: “極秘” 世界で４億人がテレビで見ているでしょう 世界で４億人がテレビで見ているでしょう

translation.en: are watching this broadcast today
translation.ja: 世界で４億人がテレビで見ているでしょう

translation.en: of the greatest event in our time,
translation.ja: 我々が生きる時代のみならず⸺

translation.en: and one of the great events of all recorded history.
translation.ja: 人類史上最も偉大な出来事です

translation.en: [Neil] I'm at the foot of the ladder.
Okay, I'm gonna step off the LEM now.
That's one small step for man,
translation.ja: １人の人間には小さな１歩だが⸺

translation.en: one giant leap for mankind.
translation.ja: 人類にとっては大きな飛躍だ

translation.en: -Are we good? -[man 1] Yes, sir.
[man 2, over radio] Unofficial time on the first step, 109--
translation.ja: 非公式だが月面 第１歩の時刻は…

translation.en: [technician] Apollo 11? This is Houston, over.
translation.ja: アポロ11号？ 応答せよ

translation.en: Eagle, we're getting a signal interference. Do you copy?
translation.ja: 通信不能になった応答せよ

translation.en: [Cronkite] We now have had confirmation of loss of signal from the Apollo 11.
translation.ja: アポロ11号からの通信が途絶えたようです

translation.en: The Apollo 11 is, at the moment, on the far side of the moon.
translation.ja: アポロ11号は現在 月の裏側です

translation.en: Neil, you are dark on the rock.
translation.ja: 月の裏側(ダークサイド)に入った

translation.en: Mission is a go.
We have 21 minutes.
My God.
It's some sort of giant metal face.
Jesus.
Control, we are inside the ship.
translation.ja: 管制室へ船の中に入った

translation.en: Extensive damage.
Way too big to check the entire ship.
translation.ja: 全部 調べるには大きすぎる

translation.en: Everything is dead in here, Houston.
No signs of life anywhere.
These things are massive.
We copy. You've got seven minutes on your oxygen.
translation.ja: 了解酸素の残りは７分だ

translation.en: We are not alone after all, are we?
translation.ja: 地球外生命が いたのか？

translation.en: No, sir. We're not alone.
[man] Go ahead, Mr. President.
[Nixon] Hello, Neil and Buzz. I'm talking to you by telephone
translation.ja: ニールとバズ ホワイトハウスから君たちに電話してる

translation.en: from the Oval Room at the White House.
translation.ja: ホワイトハウスから君たちに電話してる

translation.en: And this certainly has to be the most historic telephone call ever made.
translation.ja: これは歴史上 最も重要な通話となるだろう

translation.en: I just can't tell you how proud we all are of what you've done.
translation.ja: 言葉にできないほど誇らしい気持ちだ

translation.en: For every American, this has to be the proudest day of our lives.
translation.ja: アメリカにとって最高に栄誉な日だ

translation.en: Because of what you have done...
[technician] We have splashdown.
[Nixon] ...the heavens have become a part of man's world.
translation.ja: 天は人間の世界の一部になった

translation.en: For one priceless moment...
translation.ja: かけがえのない瞬間だ

translation.en: in the whole history of man...
translation.ja: 人間の歴史が変わった

translation.en: all the people on this earth are truly one.
translation.ja: 地球の人々は１つに結ばれた

translation.en: One in their pride in what you have done.
It inspires us to redouble our efforts
translation.ja: 今後は平和を求める人々の努力が増し⸺

translation.en: to bring peace and tranquility to earth.
translation.ja: 今後は平和を求める人々の努力が増し⸺ よりよい地球になるだろう

translation.en: [Carly] My hero needs to wake up.
translation.ja: 私のヒーローさん起きて

translation.en: What is that?
This is your new lucky bunny.
Well, it's a beautiful thought, Carly,
translation.ja: カーリーかわいいけど⸺

translation.en: but I don't think it's the whole bunny that's lucky.
translation.ja: カーリーかわいいけど⸺ 幸運を呼ぶのはここだけ

translation.en: You see, it's just this section here.
translation.ja: 幸運を呼ぶのはここだけ

translation.en: You see, it's just the rabbit foot that's lucky.
Well, it's just a good luck charm. To help you think positive?
translation.ja: でも お守りがあれば⸺ 前向きになれる

translation.en: Today's important.
Come on, get up.
Hey, wear that nice tie.
You need any money for lunch?
No, I don't need any money for lunch. I have money from yesterday's lunch.
translation.ja: 今日は要らない昨日の分が残ってる

translation.en: [Sam] You love it, don't you? I'm just your American boy toy.
translation.ja: まるで僕は君の“オモチャ”だね

translation.en: [chuckles] A lover boy toy.
You know how demoralizing it is to have saved the world twice and still be groveling for a job?
translation.ja: 地球を二度 救ったのに職探しとはね

translation.en: People don't know you saved the world, Sam. I mean, I do. I believe you.
translation.ja: 世の中は それを知らない私は信じてるけど

translation.en: The government knows. I mean, they could have hooked me up with a job right here in D.C.
translation.ja: 政府が仕事をくれるべきだ

translation.en: I mean, I should be working with the Autobots, otherwise, it's not fair.
translation.ja: オートボットと働ける仕事を

translation.en: Come on, they paid for your college. The President gave you a hero medal.
translation.ja: 政府は学費を出し勲章までくれたのよ

translation.en: [Obama] Thank you, man. Great job.
[whispering] That's the coolest thing that ever happened to me.
[whispering] What the fuck!
And, as I recall, that wasn't even the highlight of your day.
translation.ja: 本当に最高な出来事はその後よ

translation.en: Mr. Ambassador, here.
[woman] British Embassy, you're up next.
[Judy] No, you don't wear it. See, you've gotta... The box.
translation.ja: ダメよ　首にかけないで

translation.en: [Sam] I couldn't, even if I wanted to.
You keep it in this. What a gorgeous box.
translation.ja: 箱まで とても豪華ね

translation.en: Oh, yeah. My medal. You know who gave that to me?
translation.ja: この勲章誰がくれたと思う？

translation.en: -Who? -POTUS.
President of the United States.
Babe, it's hard for everybody to get a job.
I don't have time. You see, my parents are gonna be here in a week on their road trip Partybus World Tour.
translation.ja: 時間がない１週間後に親が来る

translation.en: If my dad gets here and I don't have a job,
he's gonna spank me. You know, it's go time for me.
translation.ja: 父さんの お仕置きだよ

translation.en: All right, tonight, I'll give you a job.
translation.ja: 今夜 私が仕事をあげる

translation.en: Romance me with a nice dinner, and maybe you can get that bonus.
translation.ja: 素敵なディナーを お願いボーナス出すから

translation.en: -Get lucky. -[Carly] Get him out of here!
[Carly] Oh, he's gross!
-She's good. -I'm sorry, but they're stranded here.
translation.ja: 誰かが見張ってないと

translation.en: Yesterday, that one was in my underwear drawer.
translation.ja: 昨日は下着の引き出しに

translation.en: Did research. Looking real good, too. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 調査だ　ごきげんだった

translation.en: Oh! No need to hit me, man.
You are not a normal boyfriend.
That's what you love about me.
-[Brains] Crybaby. -We're not at the love word yet. Maybe a little bit closer when you're covering your half of the rent.
translation.ja: 家賃を折半できたら本当の恋人になれるかも

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Goodbye.
[Wheelie] Frickin' shorting my circuits out here!
translation.ja: 外じゃ回路がショートする

translation.en: It's inhumane, what it is! Make us live in a box
translation.ja: 非人間的だ こんな動物と一緒にバルコニーに出しとくとは

translation.en: on a balcony, right next to a beast! Like a common animal!
translation.ja: こんな動物と一緒にバルコニーに出しとくとは

translation.en: Stop, okay? You and your creepy sidekick, you can't be in here without permission.
translation.ja: お前たちは許可なしで入室させない

translation.en: According to who? Miss Blondie Blonde?
translation.ja: あのブロンドの命令か？

translation.en: Giddyup, little doggie! Hyah!
Yo, Brains, wassup?
Doing good.
Shit, I seen this one. It's the one where Spock goes nuts.
translation.ja: スポックがイカれる回だな

translation.en: You know, Sam, I don't know about moving in with this chick. What if she dumps us like the last girl?
translation.ja: あの女 大丈夫か？前のコには捨てられたぞ

translation.en: She was mean. Didn't like her.
Us guys got to stick together.
♪ We are family ♪
translation.ja: そう“俺たち ファミリー”

translation.en: No, we're not family. You're a political refugee, and I have finally found someone who appreciates me for me.
translation.ja: 違う　お前らは亡命者彼女は僕の理解者だ

translation.en: Well, you tell her that we're not your pets, and we're not your toys!
translation.ja: 俺たちはペットやオモチャじゃねえ

translation.en: All right? We're an advanced, genius alien race just looking for a home.
translation.ja: 進化した天才エイリアンだ家を探してる

translation.en: -[Judy] Maybe it wasn't such a good idea. -[Ron] Didn't have to stop.
Come on. What're they going to do, tow it?
Where is he?
[gasps] Sammy!
-Oh, come on, that's funny! Ha-ha. -Sam.
I missed you guys so much.
Sure, you did. What do you think?
-[Sam] Look at that. -[Judy] Cute.
-[Sam] You look old. -[Judy] Stop it.
[Sam] Feel like I can see the end.
[Judy] I love your little tie. Hey, where's my girl?
translation.ja: いいネクタイねカーリーは？

translation.en: -Where's my beautiful Carly? -She's at work, Ma. She's got a new job. You guys said you were gonna be here in a week.
translation.ja: 仕事だよ来るのは来週だろ？

translation.en: The 21st, not the 11th, Dad, remember?
We just hauled ass in this thing.
translation.ja: この車を飛ばして来た

translation.en: -We stopped for gas. -This thing. The love tub, it flies.
translation.ja: この車を飛ばして来た お風呂も ついてる

translation.en: Oh, are we keeping you from something? Like, say, your job?
translation.ja: その格好もしかして就職したの？

translation.en: Well, it's about time. You had us worried.
translation.ja: やっとか　心配したぞ

translation.en: I have job interviews.
translation.ja: 実は これから就職の面接なんだ

translation.en: Oh. That's good.
translation.ja: そう　いいじゃない

translation.en: -That sucks. -Stop it.
You don't have to be so negative, Dad. You know, you're in D.C. You're here with your son and your family.
translation.ja: そう言わないでＤＣで家族が集まれたんだ

translation.en: -I mean, it's a good time. -It sucks that you don't have a job.
translation.ja: そう言わないでＤＣで家族が集まれたんだ 無職か

translation.en: Yeah, but there's good things to do here, too, right?
-Yeah. -Right? Museums and monuments, okay?
translation.ja: 博物館や記念碑を見なよ

translation.en: -I'll see you tonight. -[Ron] I'm bagging the gift.
translation.ja: 博物館や記念碑を見なよ 土産は やらん

translation.en: [Judy] Sam, I think for an interview you should wear real pants.
translation.ja: 面接はちゃんとしたズボンで

translation.en: [Sam] I think for life, you should wear real pants.
-[Judy] Oh, what happened to Bumblebee? -[Ron] Jesus.
translation.ja: バンブルビーは どこ？

translation.en: He's off on his missions. I had to get this for backup.
-[Ron] Your car has a job, huh? -[Judy] Stop.
translation.ja: 車さえ仕事がある やめて

translation.en: What does it change into?
It doesn't change into anything. It's a collector's item, Ma. I got it for a steal. It just needs some work. Trust me.
translation.ja: この車は変身なんかしないコレクターズ･アイテムだ

translation.en: [Judy] No, I think it's darling. It reminds me a lot of Bumblebee,
translation.ja: これ バンブルビーに似てるわ

translation.en: if Bumblebee were a sad piece of shit.
translation.ja: でも こっちはポンコツね

translation.en: [Judy] Come on, we'll give you a ride!
[Optimus] In the years since our arrival, our new home, Earth, has seen much change.
translation.ja: 我々の新しい故郷 地球は我々が来てから変わった

translation.en: Energon detectors guard its cities now.
translation.ja: エネルゴン探知機が各都市を守り⸺

translation.en: Long-range defense systems watch the skies.
translation.ja: 長距離防衛システムが空を監視

translation.en: So now we assist our allies in solving human conflicts,
translation.ja: 中東－違法核施設我々は人間の⸺ 問題の解決を手伝っている

translation.en: to prevent mankind from bringing harm to itself.
translation.ja: 人間同士が争い傷つけ合わないように

translation.en: [in Arabic] The Defense Minister's car.
[laughs] On the ground, per favore! And stay there!
translation.ja: 寝てろ　ペルファボーレ動くな

translation.en: [Optimus] We work in secret teams on various missions around the globe.
translation.ja: 我々は世界各地で極秘の活動を続けている

translation.en: And all the while,
translation.ja: そして その間も常に警戒している

translation.en: we search for signs of our true enemies' return.
translation.ja: そして その間も常に警戒している 最大の敵が戻って来ないかと

translation.en: [Voshkod] I am Voshkod, General Counsel with Ukrainian Department of Energy.
translation.ja: 私はウクライナ資源省のヴォスコッド

translation.en: My government will officially deny that we're having this conversation.
translation.ja: これからする話は極秘にしてくれ

translation.en: At one of our decommissioned facilities, a discovery was made,
translation.ja: ある閉鎖された施設で発見があった

translation.en: which I fear may be alien in nature.
translation.ja: 宇宙生命体に関係したものらしい

translation.en: The facility's name is Chernobyl.
translation.ja: 施設の名はチェルノブイリ

translation.en: [Lennox] Mr. Voshkod.
So, uninhabited since '86.
I hear it won't be livable again for another 20,000 years?
translation.ja: 今後 ２万年は居住できないとか？

translation.en: At least. Ukraine was the most fertile land. It's a tragedy.
translation.ja: 少なくともな豊かな土地だったのに

translation.en: This way.
[Lennox] Gear up! We have 60 minutes on the ground.
translation.ja: 用意しろ 中にいられるのは60分間注意しろ

translation.en: Watch your radiation levels.
translation.ja: 中にいられるのは60分間注意しろ

translation.en: Mr. Voshkod, where's your protective gear?
Where's your protective gear?
It would not matter. For me, it's only a matter of time.
translation.ja: 私には不要だもう手遅れだよ

translation.en: Through the school.
Yuri will take you below. And one other thing, Colonel.
translation.ja: この下にある 大佐 それから⸺

translation.en: In private, there were some energy experiments--
translation.ja: 実は ここである実験が…

translation.en: [gasps] It can wait.
[Lennox] Keep moving. Stay tight.
[soldier] Okay, right here. I think I found it.
[Lennox] Optimus, we got a visual.
translation.ja: オプティマス確認した

translation.en: Looks like the object's clamped in some kind of a metal harness.
translation.ja: 何らかの金属装置で固定されてる

translation.en: What's this? Guys!
Why does this thing have Soviet space program markings on it?
translation.ja: ソ連の宇宙計画のマークだ

translation.en: [Lennox] Sputnik?
[soldier] Energon readings, sir. It's strong.
translation.ja: エネルゴン反応 強い

translation.en: Below us. It's coming fast.
translation.ja: この下から近づいて来る

translation.en: Contact, contact!
[Lennox] Get topside now! Move, move, move!
translation.ja: 地上に戻るんだ　急げ！

translation.en: Heavy weapons up!
Stay behind me!
Optimus!
[Lennox] Fall back!
It's circling around us!
-It's taking our flank! -Come on!
[soldier] Get the heavy weapon!
Optimus!
What the hell was that thing?
[Optimus] That... is Shockwave.
translation.ja: あれは⸺ ショックウェーブ

translation.en: Why was he after this?
translation.ja: なぜ これを狙った？

translation.en: It's impossible.
This is an engine part from a long lost Autobot ship.
translation.ja: 大昔に失われたオートボットの船のエンジンだ

translation.en: Pleasure working with you.
[Judy] Interviews. This is so exciting.
Honey, do you want some gum? Your breath gets really gnarly when you're nervous.
translation.ja: ガムどう？緊張で口が臭くなるから

translation.en: Mr. Witwicky?
translation.ja: ウィトウィッキーさん

translation.en: Yeah. Search is over.
I'm Mr. Whitley.
Mr...
Is anybody else joining?
No.
No? You want me to move right there?
-I'll move right there. -I'd prefer not.
Sensei.
[Matsumoto] Ready? Begin.
Graduated this year. Majored in geopolitics, minor in tech studies.
translation.ja: 今年 卒業で専攻は地政学

translation.en: Very interested in government and technology, how that's gonna intersect and co-exist.
translation.ja: 政治とテクノロジーの共存を…

translation.en: Shape the future.
[Ron] Why did we bother sending him to an Ivy college for?
translation.ja: 名門大学に入ったのに⸺

translation.en: Three months out of school and he can't find a job?
translation.ja: 卒業後３ヵ月でも無職か

translation.en: Mr. Masuhisu...
-Matsumoto. -Hasi...
-Matsumoto. -Moto.
-Martha, can I call you Martha? -No, you may not.
translation.ja: マーサと… 呼ばないで

translation.en: Okay, Jack, there's two types of people in this world.
translation.ja: 人には２種類ある思考型と⸺

translation.en: There's thinkers, there's doers.
translation.ja: 人には２種類ある思考型と⸺ 行動型

translation.en: There's winners, there's dreamers, and there's buddies.
translation.ja: 成功型も 夢想型と友情型も

translation.en: What about some weaknesses?
[scoffs] I don't...
You have a very trustworthy face.
You remind me of, like, an Asian Colonel Sanders.
translation.ja: 貫禄ある顔ですね まるでアジアのカーネル･サンダース

translation.en: A man I can trust.
translation.ja: まるでアジアのカーネル･サンダース

translation.en: [Judy] He's a millennial. That means they're the, you know, like lost generation.
translation.ja: サムはミレニアル世代“失われた世代”よ

translation.en: Why was the FBI looking for you?
The what?
Yeah, FBI. Good of you to flag that.
It was during all that alien craziness when you were 14.

translation.en: You're frustrated, I know. I've been there.

translation.en: It's called paying your dues. Good things will happen.
translation.ja: 不満なのね私にも同じ時があった 我慢よ

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I need some lunch time filing done, stat.
translation.ja: ランチタイムに書類整理をしないか？

translation.en: Who would like to score some Bruce Brazos points?
translation.ja: 得点稼ぎをしたい者は？

translation.en: Bruce, you found your guy.
Witwicky!
The man who makes this company run.
translation.ja: この会社を動かす男だな

translation.en: Now, who have we here? Is it a sister, Facebook friend, Twitter tweeter?
translation.ja: この女性は君の姉か？ツイッター仲間か？

translation.en: -Carly, this is Bruce. Bruce. -Hi.
translation.ja: カーリー ブルースだ

translation.en: I'm his girlfriend. A pleasure to meet you.
translation.ja: 恋人です　よろしく

translation.en: Sam was right. You really do have a smashing head of hair.
Well, thank you.
-Sam, I got to run. -Yeah.
Here, your present.
Your favorite color.
-Nice to meet you, Mr. Brazos. -And you.
translation.ja: では ブラゾスさん どうも

translation.en: See you, boys.
I'm still stewing about that binder incident, Jerry.
translation.ja: さっきは ひどいぞジェリー

translation.en: May I finish my Shuhua milk, Donny?
translation.ja: ミルクを飲んでる最中だ

translation.en: I don't care about your exotic milk. I care about respect!
translation.ja: そんなミルクが何だ人を敬え

translation.en: I know who you are!
Witwicky! Witwicky!
-I'm talking to you! -Excuse me. Thank you.
translation.ja: 話を聞くんだ 失礼　どうも

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Slow down, tiger.
You showed up in the background of six different photos, two continents, with aliens.
translation.ja: 君はエイリアンと写真に写ってた

translation.en: That was you in Egypt, huh, right? Because you know the aliens.
translation.ja: 場所はエジプトだったエイリアンと友達だろ？

translation.en: See you!
Give me my jacket!
I'm Wang. Deep Wang. Deep Wang.
translation.ja: 俺はディープ･ワン “ディープ･スロート”と同じスパイだ

translation.en: You're not getting it. Deep Throat.
translation.ja: “ディープ･スロート”と同じスパイだ

translation.en: Watergate? I'm talking code to you... Shh!
Damn it.
They watch and listen.
I can't go to the government, but you can.
translation.ja: 君なら政府にパイプがある

translation.en: Because shit's going down, son! It is Code Pink, as in Floyd.
translation.ja: ピンク･フロイドの⸺ “ダークサイド･オブ･ザ･ムーン”だ

translation.en: Dark Side. Why do you think no one's been up there since 1972?
translation.ja: “ダークサイド･オブ･ザ･ムーン”だ なぜ'72年以降人類は月に行かない？

translation.en: I know you're speaking English, I just...
translation.ja: 君が話す英語はわけが分からない

translation.en: It's a very strange English. That's why I'm not--
translation.ja: 君が話す英語はわけが分からない 僕には…

translation.en: Don't. I'm gonna hit you.
I'm gonna hit you right back, son.
It's my manifesto.
They're whacking us out, everyone who knows what's on the dark--
translation.ja: 知った者は全員 殺され…

translation.en: Your alien friends are in danger, you know, the good ones. It's up to you.
translation.ja: エイリアンの友達を助けるんだ

translation.en: [Jerry] Calm down.
Easy, Sam!
What are you looking at?
Yo, dawg.
Are you up in my shit? Who are you working for?
translation.ja: 脅す気か？誰に雇われた？

translation.en: Staredown, you and me.
Guess I won.
Moon satellites.
The Russian space program. Experts dead.
translation.ja: “ソ連宇宙計画”“関係者 死亡”

translation.en: Space program ends.
Dark side... Dark side of the moon.
translation.ja: “月の裏側 ダークサイド”

translation.en: Look what I found outside the bathroom. Is it yours? Deal with this.
translation.ja: トイレに落ちてたぞ配達しろ

translation.en: Yes, sir.
I did everything you want!
I really think we should talk, 'cause some of the stuff--
Whoa! Knock first!
Can't you see I'm busy?
Who are you? Who are you?
You straddled me in the stall.
translation.ja: 僕に またがっただろ

translation.en: That's happened to me once in this life. I wouldn't forget it.
translation.ja: 生まれて初めてだ忘れないぞ

translation.en: -I don't know. -From the bathroom stall. You took your package out.
translation.ja: トイレで書類を渡された

translation.en: -Whoa! -You took your package out. We are not boyfriends, okay?
translation.ja: 君は俺の恋人じゃない

translation.en: One phone call from me and I'll have you fired. Oh, yes, I will, gaylord!
translation.ja: 電話１つで君をクビにできるんだぞ！

translation.en: -[Jerry screaming] -Are you okay?
Hemorrhoids!
Should I come back? When should I come back?
Come back when you learn some manners!
I don't know him! I would never say anything!
translation.ja: 彼には何も話してない

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Okay, okay! I sabotaged the mapping satellite, just like I promised, I can put a blind spot in the program as a bonus.
translation.ja: 観測衛星に細工し感知不能エリアも作った

translation.en: What more do you want from me?
Jerry, you are my favorite.
translation.ja: ジェリーお前は俺の お気に入りだ

translation.en: I'll do whatever you want me to do.
I know, but my superiors need me to...
translation.ja: 分かってる でもボスからの命令だ

translation.en: ...suicide you.
What did you say to Witwicky?
translation.ja: ウィトウィッキーに何を言った？

translation.en: Oh, shit!
Huh? Who wants some chicken dinner now, bitch?
translation.ja: これを食らわしてやるぞ

translation.en: 'Cause somebody messed with the wrong Wang today!
translation.ja: 俺を相手にしたのが不運だったな

translation.en: Come on! You want some of me?
translation.ja: 来い！ かかって来い！

translation.en: I don't need any more didactic lectures from Chuck.
translation.ja: チャックの お説教は役に立たない

translation.en: -[screaming] -Jesus!
[Brazos] Get legal.
That's Jerry!
Come on, people. Yes, a workmate died, but looking out the window is not going to bring him back.
translation.ja: みんな　下を見ても彼は生き返らないぞ

translation.en: The man was depressed.
Don't take a picture!
You can keep watching him, but he's not getting up. You all read "Humpty Dumpty." Okay?
translation.ja: 見てても起きないぞ道路に落ちてつぶれてる

translation.en: Witwicky.
I'm spearheading the press. You clean up.
Wang is everywhere. He is in the bistro.
translation.ja: ワンはバラバラになり食堂など⸺

translation.en: He's in the bamboo. He's on the balustrade.
translation.ja: そこら中に散らばってる

translation.en: You see the sidewalk down there? [chuckles] Man!
translation.ja: 道路を見たか？ ひどいぞ

translation.en: Box up his personals. Get his name off his parking space.
translation.ja: 彼の私物と駐車場の始末もだ

translation.en: [man] Hey, when did we get a new copier?
Listen, I'm not gonna say anything about what I saw.
translation.ja: トイレで見たことは秘密にしてやる

translation.en: Who you share a toilet stall with is totally your business.
translation.ja: 個室で彼と何をしてたかは聞かない

translation.en: This is exceedingly Japanese.
translation.ja: このコピー機は日本製だな

translation.en: They never make it easy, do they?
[Carly] What is with you?
[Sam] This is the real deal, Carly, okay? I need you to stay composed. It's real life. I'll explain it to you later.
translation.ja: 大変な事態だ落ち着け　後で説明する

translation.en: We've got an emergency. You gotta get Colonel Lennox out here. I'm reporting a Decepticon. The Decepticons are back. You gotta open that gate right now.
translation.ja: レノックス大佐をディセプティコンの襲撃だ

translation.en: Easy, sir. This is Health and Human Services.
Right. Packing M4s? What are you protecting, colostomy bags? -Bedpans? Throat lozenges? -[Carly] Babe...
translation.ja: その銃で何を守る？医療機器や咳止めドロップ？

translation.en: Where'd you get that hat from, nursing school? So, you're nurses and foot-powder protectors?
translation.ja: かぶってるのは看護学校の帽子か？

translation.en: -Babe. -Fantastic. Yes.
-I don't think we're in the right place. -We are in the right place.
translation.ja: ここは違う いや ここだ

translation.en: We're in the right place, and I'm gonna talk to Optimus right now. -You're gonna get Optimus out here. -Sir.
translation.ja: オプティマスに話がある

translation.en: You got the wrong building. I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.ja: 何のことか分からない

translation.en: What part of "Decepticons are back" do you not understand?
translation.ja: ディセプティコンが戻ったんだ

translation.en: [bangs car] Yo! You being a smartass?
translation.ja: よせ 生意気 言うな

translation.en: Do not hit my car! It's a collector's item!
translation.ja: 車を叩くなコレクターズ･アイテムだ！

translation.en: I wouldn't do that.
-[alarm blaring] -[Carly] You're crazy!
-[device beeping] -We got an Energon reading!
We've got aliens in the vehicle!
-[screaming] -You move, you're dead! Out! Out!
translation.ja: 動いたら撃つぞ！ 逃げろ！

translation.en: -Got aliens in the vehicle! -[screaming]
-Freeze! Get out! -Whoa, whoa, whoa!
translation.ja: 動くな！ よせ　撃つな

translation.en: -We're freezing! -Are you--
Are you kidding me?
[Carly] Sam, they've got guns!
[guard] I got him. Go!
Bee! Is Bee in there?
translation.ja: バンブルビー　いるか？

translation.en: [groans] Okay, all right!
This how you treat Autobots? We're on the same team.
Yeah, enjoy your next job at 7-Eleven, dickhead.
translation.ja: クビになるぞコンビニで働け

translation.en: -That's right. -A-hole.
How's your car now?
That's my car.
Come here.
Come here!
Come on. Sam.
What is your deal, huh?
I know your black ops stuff is important to you. I'm not trying to diminish it or guilt-trip you or anything, I just never see you anymore.
translation.ja: 任務は大事だろうが全然 会いに来ないなんて

translation.en: You can't come to the garage and just hang out one night?
translation.ja: 一度ぐらい遊びに来い

translation.en: Sam. That makes me feel bad.
I hope you feel bad. You should feel bad. Look at the jalopy I'm driving now. I feel bad every single day.
translation.ja: こんなボロ車に乗ってる僕の気持ちを考えろ

translation.en: [guard] Yo, let's go, both of you. Lennox wants to see you.
translation.ja: 来い　レノックスが会う

translation.en: What, we not good enough for you anymore?
I'm sorry, babe. They were very rude, all right?
And you're fixing my car. You don't think so?
translation.ja: 車の修理を頼むよいいね？

translation.en: [Sam] Raise your hand if you had a flying psycho-ninja copier trying to kill you today!
translation.ja: 忍者コピー機に殺されかけた人は？

translation.en: Those are my brass knuckles.
That's my anklet. Do I have to take that off, too? And my toe rings?

translation.en: [man, on PA] All NEST officials clear the floor. We have ten minutes until attempted contact.
translation.ja: 全員 退去せよコンタクト10分前

translation.en: [Mearing] We've taken possession of the five devices that were hidden in the ship with Sentinel Prime.
translation.ja: センチネルの船から５本の装置を回収した

translation.en: They're some kind of prototype Autobot technology.
translation.ja: 彼らのテクノロジーの試作品らしいわ

translation.en: They say Sentinel was the Einstein of his civilization,
translation.ja: センチネルは彼らのアインシュタインね

translation.en: so we're gonna keep these locked up until we know what we're dealing with.
Right now, no one gets access. No one.
translation.ja: 誰にもアクセスさせずに保管して

translation.en: This Wang guy recognized me. He told me to warn you.
translation.ja: ワンって男が⸺ 月のことを警告したら殺された

translation.en: He was talking about the dark side of the moon,
translation.ja: 月のことを警告したら殺された

translation.en: -then they killed him. -Wait a minute. He mentioned the moon?
Yeah, dark side of the moon.
translation.ja: 月の裏側(ダークサイド)だ

translation.en: But why would Decepticons want to kill humans? I thought their war was with the Autobots.
translation.ja: なぜ人を殺すの？敵の相手はオートボットよ

translation.en: And that is when he made his first quick-look science report. That's what we want--
translation.ja: これが科学レポートの要約で…

translation.en: Who's the chick? Okay. Excuse me. Colonel Lennox?
translation.ja: あの女性は誰かしら？ 大佐

translation.en: Director Mearing, this is Sam Witwicky...
translation.ja: 長官　彼はウィトウィッキー

translation.en: I know his name, Colonel. I wanna know who gave him clearance?
translation.ja: 知ってるわ誰が入室許可を？

translation.en: Who gave me clearance? How about Optimus Prime, when he touched down in suburbia looking for my house?
translation.ja: うちの庭に着陸したオプティマス

translation.en: This is the National Intelligence Director. In case you...
translation.ja: 言っておくがこの方は情報局長官だ

translation.en: -Hi. -Disrespecting a federal officer? Huh.
translation.ja: どうも 役人に失礼な態度ね彼女は？

translation.en: Maybe that'll get you somewhere. Who's she?
translation.ja: 役人に失礼な態度ね彼女は？

translation.en: -She's my girlfriend. -What is this, like, a date?
translation.ja: 僕の恋人 デートのつもり？

translation.en: She knows all about the Autobots, okay? She knows Bumblebee. And she comes from a military family. I can vouch for her.
translation.ja: 彼女は事情を知ってる家族が軍人なので大丈夫です

translation.en: Hey, I have an idea. How about we get back to the important topics, like the fact that I almost had my face cut off by a Decepticon?
translation.ja: ディセプティコンに襲われた話をしたいんだ

translation.en: As a taxpayer, I'd like to lodge a complaint, as a matter of fact.
Okay, listen, all right?
One of the software engineers at Sam's office was murdered today. He was involved in NASA's lunar mapping probe.
translation.ja: 殺された彼の同僚が月観測衛星に関与を…

translation.en: Here's the thing, Colonel Lennox.
We cannot entrust national security to teenagers
translation.ja: 国家機密を子供には明かせない

translation.en: unless I missed a policy paper. Are we doing that now? No. Good.
translation.ja: それを許可する書類も出てないわ

translation.en: I don't care who you are. If you breathe a word of what you see in here, you will do time for treason.
translation.ja: ここでのことを口外したら国家への反逆罪よ

translation.en: Do you understand me?
I'll take my orders from the Autobots. I know them. I don't know you.
translation.ja: 知らない人の命令は聞けない

translation.en: You will.
[Lennox] Sentinel Prime.
These things run on Energon, and he's out of it.
translation.ja: エネルゴン反応はない

translation.en: He's in a sort of a sleep mode.
[Optimus] Let us begin.
That's the great Matrix of Leadership.
translation.ja: リーダーのマトリックスだ

translation.en: He holds the only thing in the universe that can repower a Transformer's spark.
translation.ja: あれだけが彼を復活させる力を持つ

translation.en: This is incredible.
Sentinel Prime...
we bid you return.
Hold your fire!
Stop! Sentinel!
Hold your fire!
It is I, Optimus Prime!
translation.ja: 私だ　オプティマスだ

translation.en: It is all right. You are safe.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　あなたは安全だ

translation.en: There is nothing to fear.
We are here.
You are home, Sentinel.
translation.ja: よく戻った　センチネル

translation.en: The war... The war!
translation.ja: 戦争は どうなった？

translation.en: [Optimus] The war was lost.
Cybertron is now but a barren wasteland.
translation.ja: サイバトロンは荒れ果てた

translation.en: We have taken refuge here, on planet Earth. Its human race is our ally.
translation.ja: 我々は この地球に逃げた人間は我々の仲間だ

translation.en: My ship. We came under fire.
The pillars. Where are the pillars?
translation.ja: 柱は どうした？どこにあるのだ？

translation.en: You saved five of them, including the control pillar.
translation.ja: あなたは５本を守ったコントロール･ピラーも

translation.en: Only five?
We once had hundreds!
[Mearing] Excuse me, gentlemen. May I ask, what is this technology you're looking for?
translation.ja: 教えてちょうだいどんなテクノロジーなの？

translation.en: [Sentinel] It is the ability to reshape the universe.
translation.ja: 宇宙の形を変える力だ

translation.en: Together, the pillars form a space bridge.
translation.ja: 柱はスペース･ブリッジとなる

translation.en: I designed, and I alone, can control it.
translation.ja: それを作った私だけが操作できる

translation.en: It defies your laws of physics to transport matter through time and space.
translation.ja: 物理法則に縛られずに超時空移動が可能だ

translation.en: You're talking about a teleportation device, aren't you?
translation.ja: テレポーテーションの装置？

translation.en: Yes, for resources, for refugees.
translation.ja: 資源や難民の移送のためだ

translation.en: Refugees, or troops of soldiers, weapons, maybe bombs!
translation.ja: その他に軍隊や兵器や爆弾も運べる

translation.en: A means of an instant strike! That's its military function, isn't it?
translation.ja: 軍事目的で作った装置ね？

translation.en: It is our technology, and it must be returned.
translation.ja: 我々のテクノロジーだ返してもらおう

translation.en: Yes. If humans say so.
translation.ja: 人間が返す気になったら

translation.en: You can't just bring weapons of mass destruction into our atmosphere! You kind of have to clear customs first!
translation.ja: 大量破壊兵器を持ち込むなら税関を通してちょうだい

translation.en: A little formality called paperwork, kind of separates us from the animals.
translation.ja: 知的生命体なら正式に書類を出して

translation.en: I will overlook your condescending tone
translation.ja: その高慢な態度は許そう

translation.en: if you heed the gravity of mine.
The Decepticons must never know the space bridge is here.
translation.ja: スペース･ブリッジがあると敵に知られるな

translation.en: For in their hands, it would mean the end of your world.
translation.ja: ディセプティコンに奪われたらお前たちの世界は滅びる

translation.en: "Total Nightmare" file.
So, the investigation is open. We've sent agents to your office.
translation.ja: すでに捜査は開始されたわ

translation.en: And, for the time being, we're gonna send you home with Autobot protection.
translation.ja: あなたたちを家に送る

translation.en: Who do I need to speak to to get you guys to understand that I can help, that I can contribute?
translation.ja: 僕が力になれると誰なら分かってくれる？

translation.en: Hey, we can all help. Want to tell you what I know? I could tell you about the solar system, all the fun planets to hang out in.
translation.ja: 俺たちも力になる太陽系のことは詳しい

translation.en: Get off my desk, please.
You pulling out guns? I can't help you out now. She angry.
translation.ja: 銃を出すなら力になれない まったく

translation.en: What do you envision for me? I go home now? I go back to work? I make copies? I mean...
translation.ja: “帰って仕事に戻れ”と言うのか？

translation.en: This is a unit for veteran intelligence officers and Special Forces,
translation.ja: 情報局員と特殊部隊に任せなさい

translation.en: not for boys who once owned special cars.
translation.ja: 子供は お呼びじゃない

translation.en: That's a bit harsh, isn't it, ma'am?
Don't call me ma'am. I'm not a ma'am.
Well, you're a woman, aren't you?
So... are those yours?
translation.ja: ところで⸺ あれ あなたの？

translation.en: Yeah. CIA.
I only ask 'cause I also have a medal, from the President.
translation.ja: 僕も勲章もらった 大統領から

translation.en: Yeah. Great. So, it's not that complicated, right?
translation.ja: そう 簡単な話なのよ

translation.en: No one gets to work with the Autobots unless I approve it. You're breaking my chain of command.
translation.ja: 私の許可がない限り誰も ここでは働けない

translation.en: Come on, let's go. You've done what you came for.
translation.ja: 行こう　警告はしたわ

translation.en: With all due respect, young man, I appreciate what you did. But you're not a soldier.
translation.ja: 感謝してるけどあなたは兵士じゃない

translation.en: You're a messenger. You've always been a messenger.
translation.ja: ただのメッセンジャー

translation.en: He's a hero.
Bee, you take the freight elevator. I'll see you up there.
translation.ja: ビーエレベーターで上へ

translation.en: This blows. That lady officially kicked us out.
translation.ja: 最低だ　放り出された

translation.en: Yeah. Witness Protection Program sucks.
translation.ja: 何が“目撃者保護プログラム”だ

translation.en: Yeah, but we're a whole lot safer with big yellow and his cannons.
translation.ja: でもバンブルビーが一緒なら⸺

translation.en: That dog can't protect crap.
[Sam] Bee?
You miss hanging out?
Yeah, me too.
That woman, she called me a messenger. Can you believe that? After everything I've done, I'm a messenger.
translation.ja: あれだけ活躍したのにメッセンジャーと言われた

translation.en: I believe it. I tell you, Sammy, we feel the same way. The disrespect on this rock is criminal.
translation.ja: 本当にひでえよなあれほどの無礼は犯罪だ

translation.en: We should do something about it.
Bee, I need to know why they're killing humans.
translation.ja: ビー 専門家のところに相談しに行こう

translation.en: I say we call in the expert.
translation.ja: 専門家のところに相談しに行こう

translation.en: [O'Reilly] My next guest is a former American intelligence operative who has dared to speak out
translation.ja: 次は元秘密工作員が大胆に語ります

translation.en: regarding our alleged military alliance with what many describe
translation.ja: 我々の味方として戦っている⸺

translation.en: as a group of extraterrestrial mercenaries.
translation.ja: “宇宙からの傭兵部隊”について

translation.en: He is the author of the bestselling book, Code-Name Hero.
translation.ja: これは彼が書いたベストセラー本 「コードネーム･ヒーロー」

translation.en: Former special agent, Seymour Simmons.
translation.ja: シーモア･シモンズ氏です

translation.en: Bill. Big fan. Great to be here.
translation.ja: ビル　君の大ファンだ

translation.en: Now, Agent Simmons, you would have us believe
translation.ja: あなたは主張しています

translation.en: that it is in our best interest to formally take sides in this so-called alien civil war?
translation.ja: “エイリアンの内戦に人間も参戦すべきだ”と

translation.en: Well, the other side wanted to spank us for breakfast, so I wouldn't exactly call it a toss-up.
translation.ja: ディセプティコンは強く簡単には勝てないが⸺

translation.en: These Decepticons are lethal.
But polls show half the world would feel safer with the Autobots completely gone.

translation.ja: 人間は我々に従うか滅びるかだ

translation.en: You're lucky I didn't kill you. In time you'll see.
translation.ja: 私に殺されず幸運だないつか お前も分かる

translation.en: It's not over.
[Dylan] Now, if I were him, I wouldn't let you out of my sight for one second.
translation.ja: 私が彼なら⸺ 君から目を離さない

translation.en: It's funny. I was just thinking on the way over here,
translation.ja: 助言を聞こうと思ってたのに

translation.en: I could really use some advice from Dylan, and there he is.
translation.ja: 助言を聞こうと思ってたのに 君に話が…

translation.en: -Can I speak to you, Carly? -Welcome. Please, sit down. Have a drink.
You know what, I don't need a drink. Or a car, or a job.
translation.ja: 何も要らない 恋人と話したいだけだ構わないか？

translation.en: I just need to speak to my girlfriend alone. Is that okay with you, Mr. Inappropriate?
translation.ja: 恋人と話したいだけだ構わないか？

translation.en: Excuse me.
-[Carly] What's going on? -[Sam] I'll tell you outside.
I really think I can help you, Sam. I remember a talk I had with my dad once about tough choices.
translation.ja: 力になるよ父から受けた助言を教える

translation.en: Yeah, now's not the time. We'll set something up, though.
Of course, it was way back, when my dad's firm was in charge of budget review and accounting for NASA.
translation.ja: 父がＮＡＳＡの予算会計を担当してた頃の話だ

translation.en: You see, the thing that he taught me was, when it's not your war, you join the side that's going to win.
translation.ja: “自分に関係ない戦いでは勝つ側につけ”と言われた

translation.en: -Move. -Too direct? Or is it just me?
translation.ja: 行こう 言いすぎたか？

translation.en: Certainly not you, sir.
-[Carly screams] -[Soundwave] You're mine!
No!
-Get help! -Sam, I can't get out!
translation.ja: 降りろ！ 出られない！

translation.en: -[Sam] Someone get help! -Good night!
Good night, Mr. Dylan.
[Carly] Get me out of here!
[Sam] Help! Get help!
-He's young. He will learn. Good night. -Get me out!
translation.ja: 彼は若いから きっと学ぶ

translation.en: It was a fun night.
You really think you're the first man ever asked to join the noble alien cause?
translation.ja: 宇宙人に協力したのは自分が最初だと思うか？

translation.en: Who are you?
Do you know why we've not been back to the moon since 1972?
translation.ja: なぜ'72年以降人類は月に行かない？

translation.en: Because these two,
they came to my dad and they told him to do some creative accounting.
translation.ja: 予算を莫大に見せるよう父に依頼した結果⸺

translation.en: Make it way too expensive to ever go back. So, he and the others shut down the American and Russian space programs.
translation.ja: アメリカとソ連の月計画は中止された

translation.en: And they've been our clients ever since.
translation.ja: 以来 彼らは顧客だ

translation.en: You helped them kill people?
You think they'd give you a choice?
Besides, it's not like I personally participated.
translation.ja: 私は自分で人を殺さない

translation.en: I am a liaison. I liaise.
translation.ja: 私は自分で人を殺さない 連絡役だ

translation.en: It's hostile takeover time, Sam.
Sam!
Sam!
-Let her go! -Sam!
Sam!
[Dylan] I've had my eye on you for years, Sam.
You're the one spy I've never been able to provide as someone close to the Autobots.
translation.ja: オートボットに近づけるスパイが必要だ

translation.en: Sam! Don't do what he wants!
translation.ja: 言うことを聞かないで！

translation.en: Yes, he will.
They all do.
They will slaughter her, you understand me?
In the time it takes you to blink, they'll do it to her, and they'll do it to me.
translation.ja: 一瞬で彼女も私も死ぬ

translation.en: So you show a little respect when someone offers you a job!
translation.ja: 仕事をもらえるんだぞ喜んだらどうだ！

translation.en: Wrist.
You are to track down Optimus Prime, because you're the one human he trusts, and you will ask one question.
translation.ja: 君を信用するオプティマスに１つ質問するんだ

translation.en: How does he intend to fight back? Strategies, tactics, everything!
translation.ja: 奴らが どのような戦術で反撃するのかを

translation.en: Has a nasty little bite, doesn't it? It's very high-tech.
translation.ja: 痛いだろ　超ハイテクだ

translation.en: It lets us see what you see, hear what you hear, and it taps your nervous system.
translation.ja: 神経回路を通じ君を監視できる

translation.en: So, if you so much as try and signal...
I don't know what to tell you, Sam. Relationships have consequences. I am here because of my father.
translation.ja: 父のおかげで私は今の地位を手に入れ⸺

translation.en: She is here because of you.
Stop, stop! Stop! Stop!
Soundwave, would you please?
Sam, do your job.
She'll be safe. I give you my word.
translation.ja: カーリーは必ず助ける

translation.en: I'll kill you. You have my word.
translation.ja: お前は必ず殺してやる

translation.en: [Morshower] Combatant Commands are now at DEFCON 1.
translation.ja: 防衛警戒態勢は最高のデフコン１だ

translation.en: Approximately 200 Decepticons are now in hiding.
translation.ja: ディセプティコンは約200体

translation.en: Energon detectors have been triggered as far away as South America and China.
translation.ja: 南米から中国まで世界中で反応があります

translation.en: The U.N. just received an encrypted audio file. They say it's from the leader of the Autobots.
translation.ja: オートボット指導者から国連に声明が届きました

translation.en: [Sentinel] Defenders of Earth,
we have come for your natural resources to rebuild our damaged planet.
translation.ja: 我々は故郷を再建するため資源を求めて来た

translation.en: When we have transported all we need, we will leave your world in peace.
translation.ja: 必要な資源が手に入れば我々は引き上げる

translation.en: For such peace to exist,
translation.ja: だが そのためには⸺

translation.en: you must immediately exile the Autobot rebels you have harbored.
translation.ja: まずオートボットの反乱分子を追放せよ

translation.en: Non-negotiable.
Renounce the rebels. We await your reply.
translation.ja: 要求をのむか否か返答を待つ

translation.en: [Mearing] We'll debrief you in transit.
Yeah, I really don't see how I can be of any help. I mean, you guys seem pretty busy. We could just do this another time, I think.
translation.ja: みなさんは忙しそうなので僕は帰ります

translation.en: I have underestimated you at every turn.
translation.ja: あなたを過小評価してた

translation.en: What?
You warned us that they were using humans. And you knew that Sentinel was the key.
translation.ja: “センチネルがカギだ”とあなたは知ってた

translation.en: [man] Director!
Who am I? Hey, you're the expert. I'm just a walking security risk.
translation.ja: あなたは専門家僕は素人だ

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Yes. -No, you're not. You're sweating.
I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm sweating because I'm nervous.
I'm nervous because you got me in here with this information. Okay, I'm a Twitter junkie. I blog everything. -I can't keep a secret to save my life. -You wouldn't dare.
translation.ja: 僕はツイッター中毒ですぐに情報を流す癖が…

translation.en: Director, the Pentagon's calling in 15.
-What are you doing? -Nothing. What are you doing?
Get away from me.
It's been a remarkable series of events today at the Capitol.
translation.ja: 先ほど議会で大きな動きがありました

translation.en: Just moments ago, legislation was passed
translation.ja: 先ほど議会で大きな動きがありました オートボット追放の法案が可決され⸺

translation.en: to exile the Autobots from American shores.
translation.ja: オートボット追放の法案が可決され⸺

translation.en: The U.S. military alliance with them -is officially over. -[phone vibrating]
translation.ja: 米軍との同盟関係は終わりました

translation.en: In the words of the House Majority Leader, the sponsor of today's resolution, -"We cannot in good conscience..." -[Mearing] Okay.
translation.ja: 多数党 院内総務のコメントによれば…

translation.en: What? They can't do this.
translation.ja: 何？ ダメだ　止めないと

translation.en: You gotta tell them. They can't do that.
translation.ja: ダメだ　止めないと

translation.en: Okay. It's official. It's a go, people.
These are our allies. The Autobots fought for us. They fought with us.
translation.ja: オートボットは人類の味方だ

translation.en: And where are we now?
Facing an enemy invasion with an enemy that has the means to deploy countless more.
translation.ja: 彼らのせいで地球は敵の侵略を受けてるのよ

translation.en: If there is any more you know, anything at all about the enemy's intentions...
translation.ja: 敵の狙いについて他に何か知ってたら⸺

translation.en: now is the time to tell.
Autobots have no way of leaving this planet.
translation.ja: オートボットが必要だ

translation.en: And that is where you're wrong.
Its name is the Xanthium.
translation.ja: あの船はザンティウム

translation.en: It brought the second wave of Autobots, and it's been under NASA's care and study ever since.
translation.ja: オートボットが乗って来てＮＡＳＡが研究し⸺

translation.en: We linked it with a decommissioned shuttle to maintain military control until they're gone.
translation.ja: 彼らが地球を去るまで軍が管理してる

translation.en: Gonna be 10,000 pounds of torque on that itsy-bitsy bolt, not 19!
translation.ja: 微少な電力でこの巨大なものが動くか！

translation.en: You're gonna risk the lives of all me mates! I'll ball you!
translation.ja: 俺たちを危険にさらす気か？

translation.en: These guys are the Wreckers. They take care of the Xanthium.
translation.ja: ザンティウム担当のレッカーズ

translation.en: We don't let them off the base much, 'cause they're assholes.
You gotta pull that, ya nancy wanker!
translation.ja: お前らに できるか？

translation.en: It's time to kill him!
I'm just trying to help, you know. Just doing my job.
[Epps] Just calm down. Leave him alone. This is a human being.
-Epps! -[Roadbuster] You are ridiculous!
-[Sam] Is that you? -What up, man?
-What are you doing here? -[electronic whirring]
I retired from the Air Force.
Can you let my hand go?
What the hell was that?
Now I just consult to run interference for them.
translation.ja: 俺の仕事はモメ事の仲裁

translation.en: No more combat and aliens shooting at my ass. I got a dream job.
translation.ja: エイリアンに撃たれなくていい

translation.en: [Roadbuster] Time to get off this planet.
Kicking the Autobots out. Can you believe this is happening?
translation.ja: 彼らを追い出すって？ 信じられるか？

translation.en: Where do you think it's taking them?
Any planet but here.
I wanna talk to whoever's in charge here.
Well, well, well. Charlotte Mearing.
translation.ja: これは驚いたな シャーロット･メアリング

translation.en: Agent Simmons. Former Agent Simmons.
translation.ja: 元エージェントのシモンズ

translation.en: So, I see you survived Washington.
Washington, Egypt, heartbreak. I survive. I will survive.
translation.ja: 私はエイリアンにも失恋にも負けることはない

translation.en: They're bringing everybody in, kid. Putting all the intel on the table.
translation.ja: 政府は軍を総動員し情報を集めてるが⸺

translation.en: And if you think deporting nine Autobots is gonna solve a damn thing--
translation.ja: オートボット追放ですべて解決すると思ったら…

translation.en: It's out of my hands.
Moving up in the world, huh?
Your booty looks excellent.
translation.ja: 君の尻は今でも美しい

translation.en: If you ever say a word to anyone about what happened that night in Quantico,
translation.ja: クアンティコの夜の話を誰かにしたら⸺

translation.en: I'll cut your heart out.
You already did.
[Wheelie] Sammy, listen to me. Don't let them exile us.
translation.ja: サム　頼む 追放を…

translation.en: Don't let them take us, Sam.
It's a Decepticon trap.
[Leadfoot] Check the nitrogen levels. We're booking out of here.
translation.ja: 窒素レベルを確認出発するぞ

translation.en: Optimus?
What your leaders say is true. This was all my fault.
translation.ja: 君たちの指導者が言う通りこれは私の責任だ

translation.en: I told them whom to trust. I was so wrong.
translation.ja: “信じろ”と言った私が間違っていた

translation.en: That doesn't make it your fault. It just makes you human for a change.
translation.ja: 自分を責めるな仕方なかった

translation.en: Remember this.
You may lose your faith in us, but never in yourselves.
translation.ja: 我々への信頼を失っても自分を信じる心は失うな

translation.en: I need to know how you're gonna fight back.
I know this is strategy, I know you're coming back
translation.ja: 作戦があるだろ？ 応援部隊を集めるとか…

translation.en: with reinforcements, something. I know there's a plan.
translation.ja: 応援部隊を集めるとか…

translation.en: You can tell me. No other human will ever know.
translation.ja: 他の人間には言わないから

translation.en: There is no plan.
If we just do what they want, how are we gonna live with ourselves?
You are my friend, Sam.
You always will be.
But your leaders have spoken.
translation.ja: だが人間の指導者は決断した

translation.en: From here...
the fight will be your own.
[Optimus] Make it short.
We're loading up.
[Leadfoot] All right, hustle up! We're launching at dawn.
translation.ja: 早くしろ 夜明けに出発だ

translation.en: We're gonna do whatever we can. Make it like it was.
translation.ja: もし できれば⸺ 昔に戻りたい

translation.en: You will always be my friend, Sam.
translation.ja: 君は永遠に友達だ サム

translation.en: I gotta be going on.
Years from now, they're gonna ask us,
"Where were you when they took over the planet?"
We're gonna say,
"We just stood by and watched."
[Dylan] You should really look at this as a partnership.
You have to stand on the side of progress if you wanna be a part of history.
translation.ja: 歴史を作りたければ進化する側につけ

translation.en: [launch announcer] Seven, six, five,
four, three, two,
one, zero.
You wanted an answer. You got one.
I always get what I want, Sam. We just needed to be sure.
translation.ja: 望みは必ず叶える確認したかったんだ

translation.en: -Sure of what? -That they would go without a fight.
translation.ja: 何をだ？ 彼らが去ると

translation.en: -[man] Say again. -[woman] We're tracking an incoming object.
We all work for the Decepticons now.
translation.ja: 支配者はディセプティコンだ

translation.en: I need your help to track a phone call. There's a man on this phone. He's the head of their human operations, and he has Carly hostage.
translation.ja: 電話の逆探知を頼む恋人が拉致された

translation.en: I want you to sit down. Don't move.
Follow me.
I'm watching him drive up right now.
[Dutch] The call was placed en route. I'm hacking into the phone's camera now.
translation.ja: 携帯電話のカメラをハッキングしてみる

translation.en: There, that's it. That's a live stream from the camera.
Someplace... Hold on. I can triangulate this.
Okay, it's Chicago cell sites. There, I've got it.
Trump Tower, Chicago. Lower penthouse.
translation.ja: トランプ･タワーのペントハウス

translation.en: We're on.
-I'm going. -[Simmons] You sure?
She's done nothing but try to help me, and I can be there in 15 hours.
[Epps] You're not going alone.
I still got my NEST friends out there.
I'll round them up, we'll find your girlfriend, we're gonna bring this guy in.
translation.ja: 君の恋人を救い男を捕まえよう

translation.en: Why are you helping me?
'Cause that asshole killed my friends, too.
They said they were here for our resources, to rebuild their planet.
translation.ja: 彼らの目的は地球の資源なのね？

translation.en: Yes, but really one resource in particular.
translation.ja: そうだ 地球にしかない資源を求めて来たんだ

translation.en: One unique to our planet.
translation.ja: 地球にしかない資源を求めて来たんだ

translation.en: Us?
You're very smart. You see, they can't rebuild without a slave labor force.
translation.ja: 賢いな星の再建には労働力が要る

translation.en: How many rocks up there in the universe offer six billion workers?
translation.ja: 地球には60億の労働力がある

translation.en: What are you talking about? We can't transport people.
translation.ja: 人間を移送できないわ

translation.en: They're not shipping people. They're shipping their planet here.
translation.ja: 彼らの星を ここに移送するんだ

translation.en: [Carly] Oh, my God.
What's Sentinel doing here?
[Dylan] Watch.
They're spreading hundreds of pillars around the globe right now.
translation.ja: 地球の各地に柱を配置し⸺

translation.en: In just a few hours, they're gonna launch them into orbit and bring Cybertron into our atmosphere.
translation.ja: 数時間で柱を打ち上げサイバトロンを転送する

translation.en: The red one there controls the rest.
translation.ja: 赤い柱がコントローラー

translation.en: He triggers that, it starts the whole thing.
Be gone, insect operative. Your work is done.
translation.ja: 消えろ　虫ケラめ 仕事は終わった

translation.en: Your Excellency. He's such a dick.
You want this to happen?
I want to survive. I want 40 more years.
translation.ja: 不本意だがあと40年 生きたい

translation.en: You think I asked for this? I inherited a client.
translation.ja: 不本意だがあと40年 生きたい 顧客の要求だ

translation.en: Yeah, and when Cybertron's here and we're all their slaves, I guess they'll still need a human leader.
translation.ja: 支配された人間のリーダーになる気ね？

translation.en: Don't jinx me. You want to survive, you listen to me.
translation.ja: 生きたいなら協力しろ

translation.en: It is time for the slaves of Earth to recognize their masters.
translation.ja: 人間どもに主人が誰かを教える時だ

translation.en: Seal off the city.
Get the dogs out of here now! Get them in the back!
I guess they didn't tell you about this part, did they?
-You think I'm at every meeting? -[breathing heavily]
Look, I'm safe. They said I was safe.
translation.ja: 私の身は安全だ彼らが そう言ってた

translation.en: Let's roll!
[Epps] We had a signal earlier.
It's not working.
[newscaster, on radio] This is a national emergency broadcast.
translation.ja: 緊急事態が発生しました

translation.en: Chicago has suffered a massive attack.
[man] Wrong way!
Get out of here! Go back!
There is a ring of alien ships around Chicago.
translation.ja: シカゴ上空に敵の船団がいる

translation.en: Our high-range bombers were just knocked out of the sky.
translation.ja: 出動した高性能爆撃機は撃墜された

translation.en: They can't get through enemy air defenses over the city.
translation.ja: 街の上空の敵の防衛網を突破できない

translation.en: Our satellites have been jammed. We have no way to monitor the enemy's movement.
translation.ja: 衛星通信は妨害され敵の動きが つかめない

translation.en: Our old NEST teams are on stand-down holding at Grissom Air Force Base.
translation.ja: ＮＥＳＴチームは空軍基地で待機中

translation.en: We're about ten minutes from the battle zone.
We have Special Forces trying to gain access to the city,
translation.ja: 特殊部隊が街に接近中

translation.en: and infantry is staging at the perimeter.
Excuse me, excuse me, it just doesn't make sense!
translation.ja: 待てよ　どういうことだ？

translation.en: Can't we get any eyes in there at all?
translation.ja: 街の様子が分からない？

translation.en: They keep shooting down our drones.
They want us blind.
But we do have a couple of mini-drones we're gonna try.
translation.ja: 小型無人機を飛ばしてみる

translation.en: Well, whoever's manning these UAV drones,
can we try to redirect them toward Trump Tower? The kid, Witwickety, was on his way to Chicago.
translation.ja: トランプ･タワーに飛ばせウィトウィッキーが向かった

translation.en: Said some point-man human op is there for the Decepticons!
translation.ja: ディセプティコンの手先の人間がいる

translation.en: Listen, if I know anything, I know this, that kid is an alien-bad-news magnet.
translation.ja: サムって小僧はエイリアンを呼ぶ疫病神だ

translation.en: My God.
We came here to find her in the middle of all that?
translation.ja: ここで見つけられるか？

translation.en: Are we really going out there, Epps?
I'm not going in there.
No one's going in.
I am.
With or without you, I'll find her.
You're gonna get yourself killed, Sam. Is that what you want?
translation.ja: 自殺行為だぞ それでいいのか？死ぬんだぞ

translation.en: Is that what you want?
translation.ja: それでいいのか？死ぬんだぞ

translation.en: You came all the way out here to get yourself killed? Huh?
Listen to what I'm saying.
She's here because of me. Do you understand?
Listen, if you go in this building, that's if she's even still alive,
translation.ja: もし彼女が生きてたとしても⸺

translation.en: there's no way you're gonna be able to reach her!
What do you suggest I do?
It's over.
I'm sorry, but it's over.
No.
Whoa! Incoming!
We will kill them all.
[Leadfoot] Wreckers, kill him!
[Roadbuster] This is going to hurt!
A lot!
Your leaders will now understand.
translation.ja: これで政府も分かっただろう

translation.en: Decepticons will never leave your planet alone.
translation.ja: ディセプティコンは地球を去らない

translation.en: And we needed them to believe we had gone.
translation.ja: そこで我々が去ったと思わせたのだ

translation.en: For today, in the name of freedom,
translation.ja: 今日は自由の名のもとに⸺

translation.en: we take the battle to them!
I saw your ship blow up!
The ship?
We were never in the ship! We designed the damn thing, didn't we?
translation.ja: 乗ってなかった俺たちの計略だよ

translation.en: We were hidden in the first booster rocket to separate.
translation.ja: 切り離されたブースターに隠れ⸺

translation.en: Splashed down back in the Atlantic, just as planned.
translation.ja: 大西洋に着水したんだ

translation.en: We ain't going nowhere.
Yeah, no one's exiling us.
The Autobots are staying right here. We're gonna help you win this war.
translation.ja: オートボットは戦いこの戦争に勝つ

translation.en: They're surrounding the city to make a fortress,
translation.ja: 敵は要塞で街を囲った

translation.en: so that no one can see what they're up to inside.
translation.ja: 中の様子が分からない

translation.en: Our only chance is the element of surprise.
translation.ja: 勝つには奇襲しかない

translation.en: I think I know where to look!
[man] Mini-drone is on approach to Trump Tower.
translation.ja: トランプ･タワーに接近

translation.en: You're telling me Sam's headed into that?
translation.ja: サムが あのタワーに？

translation.en: Poor kid.
Probably never got close.
So, you can fly this thing, right?
What is that... What is that? What is that? So-so?
So you so-so can fly this. That feels terrible.
We're right behind you.
All right, we're going in!
The city is secure.
The humans cannot stop us.
translation.ja: 人間は我々を止められない

translation.en: [Sentinel] As the afternoon falls,
the rest of the pillars will reach their launch position.
translation.ja: 柱は発射位置に配置される

translation.en: [Megatron] This is the victory I promised you so many years ago,
translation.ja: 俺が昔 約束した勝利が訪れる

translation.en: where we rebuild Cybertron together!
